actions: Dries Dampness, kills parasites and stops itching topically.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, disperses Wind, kills parasites and stops itching.
Kills parasites, dispels Dampness and stops itching

symptoms: The scales and crusts are greasy
The lesions often exude an unpleasant odor
There may be fissures on and around the lesions that affect the nasolabial folds and behind the ears

contraindications: Do not apply to lesions that are eroded and weeping.

notes: Grind the ingredients together into a fine powder. Put the powder in a large amber glass jar with an airtight lid. Pour 80ml of alcohol over the powder, cover and steep for 6 hours. add the remaining 920ml of alcohol slowly, permitting the liquid to settle into the powder. Do not stir. Finally, add the menthol. Apply to the lesion with a cotton swab 3-5 time daily. Do not apply to lesions that are eroded and weeping.
